summary: Better looking wings for vampire lord.
descriptionHtml:
This mod makes the vampire lord's wings model look like something that could actually aid it in flight, there is also an option to make the wings 25% bigger. Akavir has also made some changes to the female's head mesh, giving it a more feminine appearance (don't worry, she's still really ugly so it shouldn't break immersion). He has also incorporated DrFring's VL armor retexture.

Compatibility:
Compatible with: Vampire Lord retextures, Larger VL wings by pascaliedema
Not compatible with: Mighty Beasts, Weich92's VL retexture.

Credit for this mod goes entirely to Akavir who can be found on the steam workshop, be sure to follow the link provided and rate his mods if you liked them.

[url=http://http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198054575506/myworkshopfiles/?appid=72850]http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198054575506/myworkshopfiles/?appid=72850[/url]
author: Akavir
